title: Room Management for CCU
description:
Enable full CRUD operations for room management in the HomeMatic CCU via CCU-Jack API.

Goals:
- List all rooms
- Show room details with devices
- Create new rooms
- Rename rooms
- Delete rooms
- Move devices between rooms

This provides the foundation for organizing smart home devices by location.

title: Add room listing to CCU client
description: Add list_rooms() method to CCUClient that calls /room endpoint. Returns list of rooms with their IDs and names.

title: Add room details endpoint to CCU client

title: Implement room CRUD CLI commands
description:
Add CLI commands for room management:
- ccu room create <name>
- ccu room rename <old> <new>
- ccu room delete <name>
- ccu room add-device <room> <device>
- ccu room remove-device <room> <device>
